column9: before he came upon some very large chips
column10: which were so square and flat
column11: that he thought they would be good to build houses with. He thought he would just try them a little
column12: and began to stand them up in such a manner as to make the four walls of a house. He found
column14: an unexpected difficulty; for although the chips were large and square
column15: yet the edges were so sharp that they would not stand up very well.Some time was spent in trying experiments with them in various ways; but he could not succeed very well; so he began again industriously to put them into his basket.
